description:
Are you new to Agile Process ? Are you working in Development or Testing or PM and not aware how to use Agile process in your project. In the current IT industry most of the projects are developing in Agile process only.

You can learn Agile scrum process in a day with the complete practical knowledge.

This course is designed to everyone who wants to understand Scrum process in IT industry. By the end of this course you will be able to adapt Scrum to any similar project and have an understanding of how Scrum works.

QUIZ questions with answers also included at the end of the course for the self assessment.
title: Agile Scrum Testing Process - A Practical approach
